about.title: About this App
about.tagline: A Seva for Sai Devotees to share Miracles & Experiences.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: This app is a non-commercial, non-profit project dedicated to the global community of Sai Baba devotees. Our goal is to provide a platform to document and share the leelas (miracles) of Shri Sai.

credits.title: Credits (Source Material)
credits.content: The PDF versions of Shri Sai Satcharitra are sourced from the editions published by the Shree Sai Baba Sansthan Trust, Shirdi. We credit the original author, Govind Raghunath Dabholkar (Hemadpant).

noAds.title: No-Ads Policy
noAds.content: This app is completely free of charge and does not run any advertisements or generate any revenue. It is purely a devotional service.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: All rights to the books remain with the original publishers. If you are a copyright holder and have concerns, please contact us.
